    public abstract static class KafkaAvroReporter.Builder<T extends KafkaAvroReporter.Builder<T>>
extends KafkaReporter.Builder<T>
    Builder for KafkaAvroReporter. Defaults to no filter, reporting rates in seconds and times in milliseconds.
